comments:
From 0715 build.
In a java project, select File - New - Visual Class.
Type in a package name and class name, and then select to extend the AWT 
style 'Dialog' (java.awt.Dialog).
Press finish. This produces the following exception.

Rich has a fix for this bug (same as bug 58353) and should be releasing it today
(7/16) for the M2 build.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 58353 ***

This was not fixed for the July beta. It was just fixed on Friday and is not in
the July beta.
